entries.name: intro_1
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: Hello,[delay] how are you doing today?

entries.name: intro_1_5
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: I am sorry that you are not feeling well,[delay] I wish I could help you.

entries.name: intro_2
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: I am glad that you are doing well.

entries.name: intro_3
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: Okay, it was nice speaking to you, I'm going to end the game now.

entries.name: intro_3_5
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: What cat would cheer you up?

entries.name: idgi_cat
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: Yeah, Idgi is a cute little rat.

entries.name: sumo_cat
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: Sumo is such a fat little so & so.

entries.name: outro_1
entries.speaker: Ronald
entries.text: Goodbye, thank you for stopping in.
